publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1103 Donald Gorrie: Midnight Football Programme-That the Parliament commends the Midnight Football programme, funded by the Bank of Scotland and provided by the Scottish Football Association and local police, whereby for two hours on Friday evenings young people in 14 towns in Scotland play football at appropriate centres in organised tournaments with qualified coaches and transport provided, as an alternative to wandering the streets, and suggests that the Scottish Executive should work with the existing partners to ensure that these successful projects are carried on beyond their existing nine weeks and that similar projects are started in other areas as one part of the Executive's measures to provide young people with constructive alternatives to antisocial behaviour.

S2M-1103 Donald Gorrie: Midnight Football Programme-That the Parliament commends the Midnight Football programme, funded by the Bank of Scotland and provided by the Scottish Football Association and local police, whereby for two hours on Friday evenings young people in 14 towns in Scotland play football at appropriate centres in organised tournaments with qualified coaches and transport provided, as an alternative to wandering the streets, and suggests that the Scottish Executive should work with the existing partners to ensure that these successful projects are carried on beyond their existing nine weeks and that similar projects are started in other areas as one part of the Executive's measures to provide young people with constructive alternatives to antisocial behaviour.
S2M-1103 Midnight Football Programme (lodged on 25 March 2004) Phil Gallie*

S2M-1103 Midnight Football Programme (lodged on 25 March 2004) Dr Elaine Murray*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Murray Tosh*, Bruce Crawford*, Fergus Ewing*, Richard Lochhead*, Margaret Smith*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Elaine Smith*
S2M-1103 Midnight Football Programme (lodged on 25 March 2004) Mr Keith Raffan*, Nora Radcliffe*, Murdo Fraser*, Tricia Marwick*, Robin Harper*, Susan Deacon*, Alex Neil*
S2M-1103 Midnight Football Programme (lodged on 25 March 2004) George Lyon*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Robert Brown*, Mike Pringle*, Ms Sandra White*, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-1103 Midnight Football Programme (lodged on 25 March 2004) Dennis Canavan*
S2M-1103 Midnight Football Programme (lodged on 25 March 2004) Shiona Baird*, Mary Scanlon*, Colin Fox*, Frances Curran*

S2M-1103 Midnight Football Programme (lodged on 25 March 2004) Alasdair Morgan*
